title: Pirate Doom
description: Pirate Doom! A GZDoom TC with: - 18 maps of good old runnin' and gunnin' action; - eye patches, bandannas, beards and mustaches for all Doom monsters; - cutlass, flintlock, cannons and other rusty weapons; - cool caribbean music; - compatible with any mapset; - cooperative and deathmatch modes fully implemented; - Ships, islands, treasures and rum.
